snippet: The Rangers have won seven of their past eight Game 7s, most by a single goal. Henrik Lundqvist has been in the net for the last five, winning four.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers have won seven of their past eight Game 7s, most by a single goal. Henrik Lundqvist has been in the net for the last five, winning four.

headline.main: A Long Streak in Decisive Games
headline.print_headline: A Long Streak in Decisive Games
